attributes.action: Minimum £3000 tax break for all key workers.
attributes.additional_details:
A privileged tax code for key workers in these type of emergencies will help during current and future national crises.

This code should be implemented now and then reserved/triggered again should a similar national crises arise in future.
attributes.background: Please implement a tax code for key workers which gives them minimum £3000 tax advantage in this financial year 2020-2021.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
